entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Volatile Read/Write for the ImmutableArray<T> struct #67014
  • Needlessly complex host error for app with missing shared runtime #67009
  • signal SIGSEGV: invalid address (fault address: 0x8b8) at gc.cpp:44891:33 #67008
    6.0.x
  • JsonDocument.ParseValue throws exception when parsing Utf8JsonReader when the json has a comment #67004
  • Revisit LSRA block sequence strategy #66994
  • HttpConnectionPool attempts to create connections for pre-canceled requests #66990
  • HttpConnectionPool violates HttpHeaders thread-safety via ConnectCallback #66989
  • AddRemoveFromDifferentThreads.ConcurrentStack hangs with NativeAOT #66987
  • HttpClientHandler.AddClientCertificate ignores the certificate provided when the request reaches the server #66980
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_Version #66995
  • Regressions from "Reimplement stubs to improve performance" #66997
  • Regressions from enabling reading PGO data #66998
  • Serialization of .NET 6.0 DateOnly in Service Fabric service remoting with DataContractSerializer #66977
  • No warning when trimming an app with built-in COM enabled #66975
    7.0.0
  • Debug.Assert(false) on Mono produces `Process terminated due to " ` #66971
  • runtime-libraries enterprise-linux is consistently failing to run #66970
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\VS-ia64-JIT\\V2.0-Beta2\\b311420\\b311420\\b311420.cmd #66969

Closed

  • Is it possible to get a volatile reference of an ImmutableArray<T>? #66896
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.RevocationTests.DynamicRevocationTests.RevokeEndEntity_PolicyErrors_NotTimeValid(policyErrors: True, notTimeValid: True) #66803
  • Consolidate sync/async JsonSerializer test abstractions into single type and expand async coverage for reference handler feature #66463
    7.0.0
  • Running dotnet core on Alpine for ARM32 #10111
    Future
  • XPS documents memory leak (System.Windows.ContextLayoutManager+LayoutQueue+Request and XpsDocument.GetFixedDocumentSequence()) #66756
  • corerun debugger fails on exit with "debugger type: mixed (.net core)" #65357
    Future
  • ThreadPoolTests.CooperativeBlockingCanCreateThreadsFaster timed out #64964
  • `System.Reflection.Metadata` cannot parse an assembly created by `ILASM` #66957
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols - Cannot use SortControl with custom attribute on linux #41618
    7.0.0
  • Unable to send multiple certificates in request using .net core 3.1 within HttpClientHandler #66660
    7.0.0
  • SmtpClient SendMail/SendMailAsync not encoding subject correctly with Office365 SMTP server #66648
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration needs to have its ref file regenerated #65913
    7.0.0
  • System.Data.Odbc cannot find odbc32.dll in dotnet/aspnet:6 #66822
  • Test failure GC\\Features\\HeapExpansion\\plug\\plug.cmd #63854
  • Subsequent Grpc calls with WinHttpHandler to an IIS hosted service fail #60291
    6.0.x
  • Exception throwed when accessing a freed StreamPipeReader ReadResult.Buffer is unhelpful. #53794
  • System.Text.Json SourceGenerator crashes if duplicate context class names used #66851
  • System.Text.Json SourceGenerator doesn't handle generic models #66882
  • [NativeAOT] Calling GVM on a struct in generic code is crashing with AV #66659
    7.0.0
  • .NET 5 VB Late bound variables unavailable at run time due to Public member 'Visible' on type 'Application' not found #66847
  • Building Mono with VS2022 fails with not finding 'iconv.lib' #56289
    7.0.0
  • [WASM] BlazorWasmBuildPublishTests getting oomkill'ed during linking #66725
  • Fails on non-ascii path #66913
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] EXEC : error : Arithmetic operation resulted in an overflow. "...fsbackup2.msbuildproj" System.OverflowException: Arithmetic operation resulted in an overflow #66787
    7.0.0
  • Environment.OSVersion.Platform Returns Unix NOT MacOSX #66940
  • NativeAOT: Type.BaseType throws exeption when there is no basetype in reflection-free-mode #66810
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm][aot] Run the high resource aot tests on build machine itself #67017
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Delete create-codespaces-prebuild.yml #67015
  • System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource: Perf improvement for System.Diagnostics.Enumerator<T> #67012
    area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Use the stapled OCSP response from TLS, when available. #67011
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Multiple enveloped signatures #67010
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Enable System.Text.Json tests on netfx (#63803) #67007
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.7 #67006
    area-Build-mono
  • Remove one string allocation in XmlTextEncoder by using stackalloc span and TryFormat #67005
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Use stackalloc in System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.NumberFormatterBase.ConvertToAlphabetic #67003
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Replace 2 allocations from string.ToCharArray() with ReadOnlySpan in System.Private.Xml library #67002
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Cache several char[] allocations in System.Private.Xml library methods #67001
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Fix race condition in loading assemblies with composite native images #67000
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Give end-marker symbols their own addresses to work around a linker bug #66999
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Delete AssemblyBuilderData and ModuleBuilderData #66996
    area-System.Reflection
  • Double Vector128 for SpanHelpers.IndexOf(byte,byte,int) on ARM64 #66993
    area-System.Memory
  • Avoid issuing connection attempts for already cancelled requests #66992
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Ensure exception_message points to a string #66991
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] Remove mono-perfcounters.c and most of mono-counters.c #66986
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Reenable crossgen2 promotion outside version bubble #66983
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleaned up code #66981
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution
  • Fix r4 r8 numbers #66979
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Update breaking-change-rules.md #66978
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Leaf level AOT annotation for CoreLib library #66976
    area-System.Reflection
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging perf/wasm/aot #66973
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • Perform reachability analysis before codegen #66967
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Update `main` branding to `preview4` #66962
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Fix revocation processing on expired chains. #66968
    area-System.Security
  • prevent BaseType from returning default #66955
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Remove the llvmonly exception handling code, its not used any … #66875
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Consolidate sync/async JsonSerializer test abstractions #66729
    area-System.Text.Json, test-enhancement, 7.0.0
  • Remove OfType/ToArray usage from ReflectTypeDescriptionProvider #66949
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Release `CordbUnmanagedThread` instance from `CordbProcess` member #66910
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Emscripten 3.1.1 bump #63894
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix heap walking with global allocation context #66844
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix #41618 Correct marshalling of SortKey objects on Linux #65548
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Include method instantiation MethodTables in compilation #66984
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • disable CooperativeBlockingCanCreateThreadsFaster on OSX #66988
    area-System.Threading, disabled-test
  • Fix summary doc, the client name is an argument. #66703
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Cleanup macos 32 bit #66849
    os-mac-os-x, area-PAL-coreclr
  • [mono] Initialize offset_entries #66933
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix a few #ifdef vs. #if issues #66898
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Do not set _WasmDevel=true for blazor projects #66793
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Use UTF-8 for file path in ObjWriter #66974
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Block targeting .NET 5 with NativeAOT #66972
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix some alloc-dealloc mismatches found by ASAN #66964
    area-VM-coreclr
  • remove unused code #66959
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add validation target to avoid losing test coverage with merged test wrappers #66951
    area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add metrics for caching #66479
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • Memory containment for `FIELD_LIST` operands on x86 #65803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix unaligned UTF16 string read in collect tracing EventPipe command. #66828
    Servicing-consider, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Fixes #66141: ConfigurationBinder and ISet #66151
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [API Implementation]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 1/3) #64860
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono] Optimize generic sharing for generic methods. #64129
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Avoid allocating a delegate in OptionsMonitor.Get() when possible. #66688
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • Improve `CreateDirectory` on Windows #66754
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Enable some tests #66947
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fixes #42643 allow keys with colons in JSON config #66886
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Improves handling of env prefixes containing __ #65757
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-Configuration, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Support using the system version of brotli #66462
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Add the CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute type to make it easier to identify marshaller types #65591
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Improve nullable annotations for `ILogger.BeginScope` #66960
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Optimize bswap+mov to movbe on xarch #66965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Double the size of the previous segment #66930
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Avoid name collision for covariant and hidden properties (#63443) #63823
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Introduce write barriers in wasm bindings, migrate to ref/out params, add gc safe regions #65994
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Zip64ExtraField reads StartDiskNumber as uint32 #62959
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Add timestamp-based expiration to cached SafeFreeCredentials #66334
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Proposed changes to ECMA 335 for checked user-defined operators #66714
    area-Meta
  • Ensure that fgMorphFieldToSimdGetElement doesn't call gtNewSimdGetElementNode if the ISA is unsupported #66853
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use shared SocketAddress code in QUIC #66794
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Try to fix a time-sensitive thread pool test #66765
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Debug` #66862
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Enable ASAN for CoreCLR #54580
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform #65948
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Improve `QuicImplementationProviders.MsQuic.IsSupported` for TLS1.3 On Windows #66019
    area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Use no-recent-activity in inactive Draft PRs #66771
    area-Meta
  • Delete custom cmake config cache mechanism on Unix #64370
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [PERF][TEST] Enable use MONO_ENV_OPTIONS="--llvm" on perf runs. #66742
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Add additional trace to HttpConnectionPool #66958
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Managed implementation of NTLM for Android and tvOS #66879
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Add support for creating delegates to static virtual methods #66936
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [Mono] Fix warnings to enable W4 on Windows. #66710
    os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • CoreCLR runtime tests on Mono Windows x64. #64281
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • issue-2214 Create File.ReadLinesAsync() #66492
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Methods on primitives 65707 #66654
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Refactor suggested in 65842 #66821
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Do not reorder HTTP header values #65249
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • StreamReader sync/async optimizations: ArrayPool, IndexOfAny, ValueStringBuilder #62552
    area-System.IO, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Worker Service template project does not run as a windows service without additional steps #24496
  • SDK 7.0100-preview.2.22153.17 fails to create working razor.g.cs code for certain constructs. #24489
  • More detailed error message when SDK is not found #24480

PullRequests

Created

  • Refactor some workload APIs #24488
    Area-Workloads
  • SDK support for NativeAot publish #24481
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Hide manifest updates during workload install #24451
    Area-Workloads
  • Error using skip-manifest-update and --from-rollback-file #24288
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1675596 #24395
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add default file inclusion support in .NET SDK for RESW and image files in WinAppSDK .NET projects. #24139
    Area-WebSDK

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-22
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • In case a T : D then nameof(C<T>.P.X) cannot be replaced with nameof(C<>.P.X) as T is unspecified. The compiler should assume T is D and only when D has a X nameof(C<>.P.X) is equivalent to nameof(C<D>.P.X) otherwise you need to specify the generic type parameter to access X. #5944

Updated

  • Champion "readonly for locals and parameters" #188
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix broken links #5943
  • Specify behavior of default this initializer with field initializers #5940

Merged

  • Remove incorrect `override` keywords #5828
  • Update required members sections #5924

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [EnC] PrivateImplementationDetails isn't supported in Edit and Continue #60328
  • Missing "variable is assigned but its value is never used" warning for assignment utilizing UTF8 String Literal #60319
  • await code fix / analyzer enhancement #60318
    Backlog
  • Do not allow targeted new expression when type is not apparant #60309
    Backlog
  • Find All References to NuGet package/Assembly #60307
    Backlog
  • Region should indent when within function #60306
    Backlog
  • Search for method names in classes using Solution Explorer search is not consistent in case-sensitivity #60305
    Backlog
  • "Extract method" - generated method with expression body if possible #60303
    Backlog
  • Refactor - surround highlighted text with Try/Catch #60302
    Backlog

Closed

  • Deadlock in project system #57857
    17.1
  • Extra config options for `IDE0037` #60083
    Backlog
  • Cannot use fix provider for the issues identified in RegisterCompilationAction #60155
  • Light bulb does not invoke code fix provider for diagnostics created in compilation end action #51653
    Backlog
  • TestMethodSpansWithAttributes in Emit test fails locally. #42528
  • CS8424 being raised on non-async iterators is too aggressive. #40893
    17.2
  • Improve CS8603: "Possible null reference return" for String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace check #60304
  • [MetadataAsSource] Decompilation can end up showing the wrong source language #60253
    17.2
  • TestNullCoalesce_Dynamic test asserts if `GetEmitDiagnostics` call added #60059
    17.2
  • LocalRewriter adds placeholder of wrong type when building `runtime` repo #58176
    17.2
  • NullCoalescingOperatorWithTupleNames test asserts if `GetEmitDiagnostics` call added #60046
    Compiler.Next
  • Unexpected scoping on type parameter of local function #59775
    17.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not run CI for non code files #60327
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adjust DefiniteAssignmentPass.WriteConsideredUse for UTF8 String Literals. #60326
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1676641 #60325
    auto-merge
  • Test bitness #60324
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix our x86 test execution #60323
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [LSP] Remove isFinalized from semantic tokens logic #60322
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unreported telemetry #60321
    Area-IDE
  • Fix issue when multiple different diagnostics share a single fixer #60317
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.3 #60314
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Add support for CheckedStatement for smart break line #60308
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • [semi-auto-props]: Fix speculative semantic model scenarios #59767
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Check for reference assembly before deciding which language to show #60271
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1674979 #60301
    auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60320
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add basic TS LSP server #59639
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Fix XLF files that were manually edited #60312
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60316
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60313
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.3 #60311
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix conversion issues in null coalescing operator #60202
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix type parameter scoping for local functions #60098
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60310
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #60300
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update SDK version in docs, etc. #60299
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.3 #60291
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60295
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Always try to use cached data for import completion even if outdated #59760
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Remove enableRoslynAnalyzers from codespace default settings #60203
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix top-level speculation #60274
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Don't offer convert to switch when an implicit cast is present #60224
    Area-IDE
  • Check accessibility before offering "Implement interface" codefix #60297
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Updating our DiaSymReader.Native support #60290
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Initialize MEF parts before switching to the UI thread #60289
    Area-IDE
  • Add analyzer/fixer that notifies people about explicit (but hidden) casts the compiler generates for foreach-statements. #60120
    Area-IDE
  • Improve error message for unmatched override that uses 'T?' #55624
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't add async modifier for non-awaitable return method #55983
    Area-IDE
  • Show linked symbol in Inheritance Margin #60225
    Area-IDE
  • Implicit field initialization in struct constructors #59788
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Callback manager in SignalR C++ client should use ints instead of strings for ids #40832
  • [Blazor] [WASM] Not being able to configure a custom query parameter on Login #40826
  • Allow For Inheritance with RouteAttribute #40825
  • Mvc.Api.Analyzers should treat `IResult` types correctly #40823
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Multiple instantiation of my app when hosted on IIS: on AppPool Start, On Website Start and on Website Stop #40822
  • Multiple Authentication Schemes are mutually exclusive #40820
  • Blazor Server project template: Static assets versioning with `asp-append-version` tag-helpers #40818
    Discussions
  • How I can cross compile SignalR C++ Client on raspberry pi(armv7l)? #40815
  • Blazor Server: hang when circuit disconnects #40814
    6.0.x

Closed

  • System.Text.Json NotSupportedException #40799
  • Meaningless usage of Enumerable.OrderBy #40824
  • Blazor InputNumber and InputDate components fail to compile on .NET 7 Preview 2 #40786
  • @javiercn Thanks for your support. #40813
  • SupplyParameterFromQuery includes anchor #40806
    7.0-preview3

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix alignment issue on arm64 #40831
    area-runtime
  • Prevent cookie middleware from redirecting API requests #40830
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Add `onmouseenter`, `onmouseleave` events #40829
    area-blazor
  • Add ElementReference to InputRadio #40828
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Update branding to preview4 #40812
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Quarantine Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.FunctionalTests.LinkedApplicationTests.LinkedApplicationWorks #40821
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • [Infrastructure] Update dotnet sdk version #40819
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Ignore hash when supplying querystring parameters #40808
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3
  • Avoiding `ParameterBindingMethodCache` exceptions in MVC #40738
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • Adding a new ActionResult to process IResult #40710
    area-mvc
  • Include arm64 payloads for hosting bundle #40709
    area-infrastructure
  • [SignalR] Add client return results #40811
    area-signalr
  • After RequestAborted, Response.BodyWriter does not signal IsCompleted/IsCanceled #40570
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Cleanup logs after successful test runs #40807
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Support falling back to ConnectionId when RawConnectionId is 0 on HTTP.sys #40760
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.5
  • In JS interop, handle ValueTask equivalently as Task (#40198) #40533
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Write fields directive to streamwriter #39900
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix DebugServices.UnitTests VersionData failures #2955
    .NET 7.0

Closed

  • SOS is reporting a heap corruption error when it isn't #2929

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix heap walking with global allocation context #2949

Updated

  • Testing main, adding in net7.0 testing #2836
  • Add single file debugging support to dbgshim #2941

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RadioButton - Use default control templates for WinUI3 #5502
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Unable to build the latest MAUI (preview 14.0) project with VS 2022 for Mac Preview 7 (17.0 Preview, build 8001) #5499
  • Review accessibility properties used in default template #5487
  • [Enhancement] CalendarView #5486
    Future
  • [Enhancement] Shell footer template in lieu of WinUI NavigationView.FooterMenuItem's #5485
    Future
  • Images not rendering correctly #5484
    6.0.300
  • Please Make a Ribbon or Toolbar for .Net MAUI #5481
    Future

Closed

  • Error `Workload ID android-aot isn't supported on this platform.` on Windows #4363
  • workload install maui failing when installing microsoft.maui.resizetizer.sdk #5435
  • Linear gradient brushes throws an exception in XAML Editor. #4414
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • MAUI missing net6.0-ios #5199
  • Getting issue when trying to open a new window #4426
  • File Picker always returns cached copy of selected file on Android. #4195
  • PathFigureCollectionConverter.ParseStringToPathFigureCollection not working correctly #4450
  • Remove hard tabs from templates #5068
  • Mac Catalyst Publish Failure #5197
  • MAUI Blazor hybrid apps crashing on iOS / iPadOS / macOS #3980
  • OnPlatform markup extension defines properties for platforms no longer supported #4350
  • OnIdiom markup extension gets the Windows form factor wrong #4351
  • [Android] FlyoutPage not rendering #4083
  • [Bug] FlyoutWidth not initially sized correctly on Windows #2581
    6.0.300
  • Flyout works on Windows but not mobile devices #3700
  • [Bug] UWP Backward Navigation shows "B" page's TitleView content when ScrollView is in "A" page's TitleView #1073
  • [Bug] Toolbar item on a content page behaves different on platforms #3079
  • [iOS] Crash trying to launch an App using a NavigationPage #4048
  • [Bug] Flyout item selection not reset #2764
  • Page title won't update when switching tabs with top bars inside a TabBar inside a shell on Android #3743
  • Not rendering FlyoutContentTemplate #4801
  • AppThemeBinding not working (p11/p12) #4335
  • Having issue with svg files #4361
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • [Bug] ToolbarItems not rendered in Windows app #2589
  • Build Error NETSDK1032 when changing Platform Target to x86 on Windows #4503
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] CarouselView not rendering in Android after VS2022 Preview 3 update #2118
  • ViewModel databinding not working if element is inside StackLayout #4796

    6.0.300
  • [Bug] KnownColor.SetAccent is currently not initialized on any platforms #3359

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Clause order is mixed up when logging SQL statements to console #27687
  • Allow migration bundles to include migrations for multiple contexts #27685
  • FirstOrDefault when using datetime type fails #27684

Closed

  • Relational-specific methods can only be used when the context is using a relational database provider. #27667
  • Many to Many, Hide One collection Navigation property #27658
  • Error - Cannot resolve the collation conflict between "Latin1_General_CI_AI" and "Latin1_General_CS_AS" in the equal to operation. #27601

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to preview4 #27683
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Update to .NET SDK 7.0 Preview 2 #27447
    auto-merge
  • Update tool to roll forward to latest major version of runtime installed. #27671
  • Add TPC support for migrations #27665
  • Simplify logging by collapsing together sync/async #27668
  • Split Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Analyzers into language-specific analyzers #22195

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 7.0 apps can't run with latest main branch sdk #13450

PullRequests

Created

  • Update NuGet path issue in Run Tests CI step #13453
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #13451

Updated

  • Refactor SdkContentTests to warn on diffs when run in CI #13432
  • Add leak detection #13434
  • Add SDL checks #13448
